scripts.cy:merge:step-2/2: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mocha/*.json -o cypress/reports/mocha/output.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator cypress/reports/mocha/output.json -o cypress/reports/mocha --inline
scripts.cy:report:all-file: npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports/mocha,overwrite=false,html=true,json=true && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mocha/*.json -o cypress/reports/mocha/output.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator cypress/reports/mocha/output.json -o cypress/reports/mocha --inline
